original: Lloyd von Sanctus personally sold several industrial tools to Stefanic Dracogen on behalf of Von Sanctus Industries. A lot of these tools were present in the Arcane Refinery. Von Sanctus Industries also created the security system for the Refinery.\n\nVon Sanctus attempted to sell Dracogen a few Arcane Constructs: a product that is not available to anyone else in Aurinax. However, Stefanic Dracogen did not trust the Constructs’ ability to performs tasks effectively. He did not purchase any.
translation:
洛伊德代表冯·桑克图斯工业，私下卖给了斯蒂芬尼克·德拉科根数种工业道具。不少道具都出现在奥术炼油厂内。冯·桑克图斯工业也创造了炼油厂的安保系统。



冯·桑克图斯曾尝试卖给德拉科根数个奥术构造体：一种欧奥耐克斯城内还买不到的产品。但斯蒂芬尼克·德拉科根并不相信构造体的工作效率，也因此没有购买。
